Interface Renderer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.psddev.dari.db.Recordable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExternalContent, Grid, Markdown, Text

    public interface Renderer
extends com.psddev.dari.db.Recordable

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Renderer.Data
      Global modification that stores rendering hints.
      static interface  Renderer.EmbedPath
      Specifies the servlet path used to render instances of the target type when embedded in another page.
      static interface  Renderer.EmbedPreviewWidth
      Specifies the width (in pixels) of the preview for the instances of the target type.
      static interface  Renderer.Engine
      Deprecated. 
      No replacement.
      static class  Renderer.FieldData
      Field modification that stores how field values should be rendered.
      static interface  Renderer.LayoutPath
      Specifies the servlet path used to render instances of the target type as a page.
      static interface  Renderer.ListLayout 
      static interface  Renderer.ListLayouts 
      static interface  Renderer.Path
      Specifies the servlet path used to render instances of the target type as a module.
      static interface  Renderer.Paths 
      static interface  Renderer.Script
      Deprecated. 
      Use Renderer.Path instead.
      static class  Renderer.TypeModification
      Type modification that stores how objects should be rendered.
